text: @ChrissieEvert Chrisy, Let them all pass Covid-19 around so people will realize for X-100th time what a bad leader the Donald is. He is a joker who lets his arrogance dictate his decisions.  Yes, we will endure more pain and the economy will take another hit, but the Donald will fall for good.

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
